dialogues: My precious son! I just won the lottery! We're having a feast tonight!
I heard about your promotion! I'm so proud, I've already told all the neighbors!
Your father and I are in such good health, our family is truly blessed!
Seeing you so successful makes me feel ten years younger!
I just found my old wedding ring that I lost years ago! What a miracle!
I cooked your favorite meal today, come in and eat while it's hot.
The neighbor just complimented how handsome and polite you are.
The house is so clean today, it really lifts my spirits.
My garden is blooming beautifully this season, come take a look.
It was so nice talking to your aunt on the phone today.
Remember to bring an umbrella, the forecast says rain this afternoon.
Are you free to come home for dinner this weekend?
Prices at the market are going up again, be careful with your spending.
Don't forget to take your vitamins, son.
Have you called your grandmother lately? She was asking about you.
You rarely call home these days, I feel a bit lonely.
My back is hurting again... getting old is really hard.
Your father has been so grumpy lately, I'm exhausted.
I cooked too much food and no one is here to eat it.
Sometimes I feel like a burden to you children.
Where have you been until this hour? Do you treat this house like a hotel?
Asking for money again? How old are you? Can't you take care of yourself?
Look at your cousin! Now look at yourself! What a disappointment.
I told you to clean your room a thousand times! Why don't you listen?
Don't you dare raise your voice at me! I am your mother!
Honey! I just got accepted into my dream company! Let's go celebrate!
This gift is amazing! You know exactly what I wanted. I love you so much!
I feel like the luckiest woman in the world when I'm with you.
We just won the couple's contest! We are the best team ever!
I can't stop smiling today, everything is just perfect!
You look so handsome today, you're making my heart skip a beat.
Thanks for the romantic dinner last night, it was lovely.
I just learned a new recipe, want to be my taste tester?
Just holding your hand makes my day better.
I found a great movie for us to watch tonight.
What should we eat tonight? I'm too lazy to cook.
Are you done with work yet? I'm waiting at the coffee shop.
We need to go grocery shopping this weekend.
Did you remember to pay the electric bill?
I'm going to hang out with my friends for a bit, okay?
You seem so distant lately, do you even care about how I feel?
My boss yelled at me today... I just want a hug.
I feel like we are slowly drifting apart.
You forgot to text me goodnight yesterday...
I saw a sad movie and now I can't stop crying.
You forgot our anniversary again, didn't you?
Who is that girl texting you at midnight? Explain yourself!
It's always games, games, and games! Do you love your PC more than me?
I waited for two hours! Why didn't you pick up the phone?
I am sick of your excuses! Take some responsibility!
Dude! I just won the jackpot! Drinks are on me tonight!
I just bought a beast of a PC! Come over and game!
My crush actually said yes! My life is complete!
My favorite team just won the championship! Let's goooo!
I got that promotion I was telling you about! Finally!
That match last night was epic! Want to grab a coffee?
Long time no see, bro. I'm actually free today.
I found a cheap but amazing restaurant nearby.
Just got paid, let's go grab a beer.
You won't believe the funny thing that happened to me today.
Hey, can I borrow 20 bucks? I'll pay you back tomorrow.
Up for a few ranked matches tonight?
Have you heard about Mike? Rumor has it he's getting married.
Do you know a good place to fix my phone?
I'm thinking of joining a gym, want to come with?
I just got fired, man... This sucks.
My girlfriend just broke up with me. I need a drink.
I'm completely broke, I can't even afford instant noodles.
I failed my driving test again... I feel so stupid.
My dog is really sick, I'm worried.
You played dirty back there, I won't forget that!
I called you ten times and you ignored me? Are we even friends?
Pay me back my money! You promised last week!
Stop flirting with my ex! That's not cool, man.
You bailed on us at the last minute again? Unbelievable.
The project is a massive success! Record profits! Everyone gets a bonus!
You are a rare talent! I'm promoting you to manager immediately.
I just signed a million-dollar contract! I'm in a fantastic mood!
Our stock price just doubled! Champagne for everyone!
We just crushed our biggest competitor! Good job team!
Great report, keep up the good work.
You're always the first one here, I appreciate your dedication.
I'm buying coffee for the whole office today, enjoy.
The client was very impressed with your presentation.
You can leave early today, you've earned it.
Send me the weekly report before 4 PM.
What's the status of the project? Update me ASAP.
Prepare the documents for the upcoming meeting.
Make sure to cc me on that email.
We have a team building event next Friday.
Company stocks are plummeting... I have a migraine.
Too many customer complaints lately, I'm disappointed in this team.
We might have to downsize next quarter...
I lost a major client today. This is bad.
I haven't had a vacation in three years...
What kind of work is this? How could you submit such garbage?
If you don't hit your KPI this month, write your resignation letter!
Who authorized you to leave early? This is unacceptable!
You just cost the company a fortune with that mistake!
Stop making excuses and get it done! Now!
The boss just announced a 5-month bonus! Party time!
Finally finished this nightmare project! Freedom!
My vacation to Europe just got approved!
I just got the 'Employee of the Month' award! Woohoo!
The cafeteria is serving free pizza today! Run!
The boss is out today, the office is so chill.
Thanks for helping me with that Excel sheet, lunch is on me.
Payday is finally here! Ka-ching!
I love the new coffee machine they installed.
Hey, nice tie! Looking sharp today.
The printer is jammed again, can you take a look?
What's for lunch? Bento or sandwiches?
Have you seen my stapler anywhere?
Is the air conditioning too cold or is it just me?
Can you cover for me for 10 minutes?
Overtime again... I miss my bed.
The boss rejected my idea, all that effort for nothing.
I got my pay docked for being late. I'm broke.
I think I'm coming down with the flu...
This commute is draining the life out of me.
Who ate my lunch from the fridge?! I labeled it!
Why are you pushing all the hard work onto me? Not cool!
Don't go snitching to the boss about me sleeping! Traitor.
Can you stop typing so loudly? I can't concentrate!
You took credit for my work again! We need to talk.
